title: Album Page, "Lamps at Gondola Landings, Venice", October 24, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner: (inscribed in circle) 72 / 83; from center, left: In front of Hotel de l'Europe; Piazza St Marco; Beyond the "Bridge of Straw"; Lamps at / Gondola Landings / Venice / Oct 24th 1887.
description: Vertical sheet with an uneven or torn bottom edge and pinholes at all four corners.  Three lamps on pedestals at gondola landings are depicted, all in shades of green with small elements highlighted in yellow to indicate gilding.  From left, a lamp in front of the Hotel de l'Europe; in the middle, a lamp from Piazza San Marco; and at right, a lamp from the landing near the Bridge of Straw (Ponte delle Paglia).

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Lamps at Gondola Landings, Venice", October 24, 1887.
October 24, 1887. Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-146.
